name: coveralls-overlay
description: Chrome extension to overlay coveralls code coverage

scripts.lint:src: tslint -c .tslintrc src/githubWindow.ts src/overlayWindow.ts src/browsers/chrome/bootStrapper.ts src/browsers/chrome/options.ts src/storageObject.ts src/syncStorage.ts
scripts.package:options: browserify -d dist/build/browsers/chrome/options.js dist/build/storageObject.js dist/build/syncStorage.js | exorcist dist/chrome/lib/options.js.map > dist/chrome/lib/options.js
scripts.package:main: browserify -d dist/build/browsers/chrome/bootStrapper.js dist/build/githubWindow.js dist/build/overlayWindow.js dist/build/storageObject.js dist/build/syncStorage.js | exorcist dist/chrome/lib/coveralls.js.map > dist/chrome/lib/coveralls.js
scripts.package:resource: cp -r resources dist/chrome && cp ./node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/chrome/lib && cp ./node_modules/rx/dist/rx.min.js dist/chrome/lib && cp ./node_modules/rx-jquery/rx.jquery.js dist/chrome/lib
scripts.package:manifest: cp src/browsers/chrome/manifest.json dist/chrome && cp src/browsers/chrome/options.html dist/chrome/lib
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:init && npm run package:less && npm run package:manifest && npm run package:resource && npm run package:main && npm run package:options && npm run package:cleanup
